department.dept_long_name: Committee on Degrees in Studies of Women, Gender, and Sexuality
department.dept_short_name: Studies of Women, Gender, and Sexuality

course.course_group: Studies of Women, Gender, and Sexuality
course.title: Tutorial - Junior Year: Research and Methods
course.notes: WGS Juniors are expected to take 98s in the spring term. This course is only open to students planning to be on leave in the spring term of the junior year. Permission from the DUS in WGS and updated plan of study required.
